resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106242</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106242</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206413</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Archival Research Catalog (ARC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Archivalische Forschung Katalog (BOGEN)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Catalogue Archivistique de Recherches (ARC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Catálogo Archival Da Pesquisa (ARCO)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Catalogo Archivistico Di Ricerca (ARCO)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αρχειακός ερευνητικός κατάλογος (ARC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Catálogo Archival De la Investigación (ARCO)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a searchable database of the cornerstone documents of our government. It has more than 100,000 digitized copies of the National Archives most popular and significant manuscripts, photographs, maps, drawings and other documents.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine auffindbare Datenbank der 
Grundsteindokumente unserer Regierung. Sie hat mehr als 100.000 
digitalisierte Exemplare der nationalen populärsten Archive und der 
bedeutenden Manuskripte, der Fotographien, der Karten, der Zeichnungen
und anderer Dokumente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une base de données rechercheable des 
documents de pierre angulaire de notre gouvernement. Elle a plus
de 100.000 copies numérisées des archives nationales les plus 
populaires et les manuscrits significatifs, les photographies, les 
cartes, les schémas et d'autres documents.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma base de dados searchable dos originais do 
cornerstone de nosso governo. Tem mais de 100.000 cópias 
digitadas dos arquivos nacionais os mais populares e manuscritos 
significativos, fotografias, mapas, desenhos e outros originais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una base di dati reperibile dei documenti della
pietra angolare del nostro governo. Ha più di 100.000 copie 
date valori numerici a degli archivi nazionali più popolari e 
manoscritti significativi, fotografie, programmi, illustrazioni ed 
altri documenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια εξερευνήσιμη βάση δεδομένων των εγγράφων 
ακρογωνιαίων λίθων της κυβέρνησής μας. Έχει περισσότερα 
από 100.000 μεταλλαγμένα αντίγραφα των εθνικών δημοφιλέστερων 
και σημαντικών χειρογράφων αρχείων, των φωτογραφιών, των χαρτών, 
των σχεδίων και άλλων εγγράφων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una base de datos investigable de los 
documentos de la piedra angular de nuestro gobierno. Tiene más 
de 100.000 copias digitalizadas de los archivos nacionales más 
populares y los manuscritos significativos, las fotografías, las 
correspondencias, los gráficos y otros documentos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206413</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106242</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-archival-research-catalog-arc</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
